'''''SEVEN 22''''' is the twenty-second volume of the [[Marion E. Wade Center]]'s annual journal ''[[SEVEN]]'', published in [[2005]].<ref name="jstor" />
==Contents==
*"MacDonald's Shorter Fairy Tales: Journeys into the Mind"
**By: Colin Manlove
*"The Orthodoxology of Dorothy L. Sayers"
**By: Crystal Downing
*"C.S. Lewis, T.S. Eliot, and the Anglican Psalter"
**By: George Musacchio
*"Fire and Ice: C.S. Lewis and the Love Poetry of Joy Davidman and Ruth Pitter"
**By: Don W. King
*"C.S. Lewis's Use of Analogy in Theological Understanding"
**By: Robert J. Palma<ref>{{webcite|articleurl=https://journals.wheaton.edu/index.php/vii/article_index|articlename=Contents By Volume|website=[https://journals.wheaton.edu/index.php/vii/index VII: Journal of the Marion E. Wade Center]|accessed=13 August 2025}}</ref>
